answers.answer: Hi,It seems as if you are putting undue pressure on you foot while scratching. The other possibilities are peripheral neuropathy due to diabetes mellitus, Hypothyroidism, alcoholism, diseases like Guillian Barre syndrome, rheumatoid arthritis, lupus, kidney and liver diseases. Also, tarsal tunnel  syndrome is a possibility. You need to visit your GP for further evaluation.Regards

question: my feet do not itch. when i sratch the top of my feet i get pins and neddles shoot down towards my toes
title: pins and needles
